text:
Paul Koslo (June 27, 1944 – January 9, 2019) was a German-Canadian actor. He was born in Germany, but raised in Canada. Koslo was known for his roles as Luke in "Rooster Cogburn", Dutch in the "The Omega Man", as Charlie in "Vanishing Point" and as Langley in "The Stone Killer".
Koslo died on January 9, 2019 from pancreatic cancer at the age of 74.
